about_the_game:
Cosmula is a fast-paced space shooter where you engage in intense battles across randomly generated environments. Play in multiplayer or single-player in various game modes, with support for up to 6 players!

SPACESHIPS

Play each of the 6 spaceships, each with its own stats, primary and secondary weapons, as well as a utility, passive, and ultimate. Choose a spaceship that fits your playstyle to defeat your opponents and dominate the battlefield. Each spaceship also has its own leveling system to display your experience piloting it!

ENERGY

Collect energy on the battlefield and utilize it to fit your playstyle. Spend energy to repair your spaceship, gain a speed boost, hack turrets to turn them onto your side, or activate your spaceship's ultimate. Use your energy wisely to defeat your opponents, whether by unleashing a devastating ultimate or hacking strategically placed turrets!

ENVIRONMENT

Explore the randomly generated environment in each game. Avoid asteroids and explosives while evading the danger of enemy turrets. Overcome various anomalies, including temporal fields, electrical storms, wormholes, and more. Utilize the strategic advantage of an electrical storm to ambush your opponents or quickly escape danger by traversing through a nearby wormhole!

GAME MODES

Play 3 different game modes in single-player or multiplayer, each available with bots and in Teams or Free-for-All, with adjustable map sizes. Defeat as many enemies as possible in Deathmatch, be the last to survive in the closing zone of One Life, or fight for control of the battlefield in Zone Control!

ACHIEVEMENTS

Complete various achievements to unlock in-game avatar borders to show off in multiplayer!
